steps.name: 1 | Set properties for IMAP and SMTP connection
2 | Connect with the server for test_sender_api@outlook.com
3 | Send new email from test_sender_api@outlook.com to veraktung@outlook.com 100 times
4 | Return the number of emails in the folder Inbox
